trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource" /> that uses a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> for content.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Drawing" /> 內容當做內容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource" />。

trans-unit.source: to display images that you don't have <see cref="T:System.Net.WebPermission" /> or <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" /> access for.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示的影像，您不需要<see cref="T:System.Net.WebPermission" />或<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission" />存取。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage.SafeImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.MediaPermissionImage.SafeImage" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage.Drawing" /> of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 執行個體的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage.Drawing" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> class that has the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage.Drawing" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體具有指定的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage.Drawing" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing content for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 繪圖內容。

trans-unit.source: The drawing content for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 的繪圖內容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是**null**。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier Field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata Flags
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料旗標

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage.Drawing" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage.Drawing" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 的高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the metadata of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: The metadata of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" /> 的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The width of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage" />的寬度。
